sentences.english: We can look at the basic structure of Deuteronomy in a couple of ways.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以通过许多种方式来研究申命记的结构。
申命记》中出现了一位国王。

sentences.english: However, in Deuteronomy , there were exceptions to this prohibition of intermarriage.
sentences.chinese: 但是，在《申命记》里，也有关于允许通婚的特例。

sentences.english: Deuteronomy 18:9 commands Israelites not to copy the toevah of other nations.
sentences.chinese: 申命记18:09命令以色列人不要模仿他国的礼教。

sentences.english: And he was expanding Deuteronomy chapter 7, that’s the place where God is saying to the children of Israel.
sentences.chinese: 他当时讲的是申命记第七章。

sentences.english: A further theme of Deuteronomy is the emphasis on love.
sentences.chinese: 申命记另一个更深远的主题是爱。
